actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to permit regulation of automated blood pressure machines to ensure the accuracy and reliability of their performance.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to classify automated blood pressure machines as class II medical devices, notwithstanding certain requirements of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act for classification of medical devices, in order to insure the accuracy and reliability of the performance of such machines.

titles.title: A bill to permit regulation of automated blood pressure machines to ensure the accuracy and reliability of their performance.
